summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of alley in Block 43, Pontius 2nd Supplemental Addition, being the alley from East Mercer Street to East Roy Street, between Belmont Avenue North and Summit Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 109278 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
